EmailTemplate.description: User Reactivation was successful and all licenses (if any) are failed to restore..
EmailTemplate.name: User Reactivation Issues
EmailTemplate.subject: Salesforce User Reactivation Issues
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Your salesforce user ID is successfully reactivated. User Name: {!Receiving_User.Username} Please click on the link to access salesforce: Launch Salesforce
Some of the user licenses cannot be added to user profile due to technical limitation. Please create a VIA request.
Regards, Salesforce Platform Support
